document_data.name: Mosque of Blistering Atonement
document_data.location: [[City of Brass]], the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]]
document_data.source: [[Secrets of the Lamp|Secrets of the Lamp, Genie Lore]]
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Mosque of Blistering Atonement''' was located in the [[City of Brass]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}

This mosque was found in [[Furnace (district)|the Furnace ward]] of the city.
document_data.Description: As a dedicated shrine to [[Imix]], a terrifying [[archomental]] of fire, the entire building was covered with corroded [[copper]], creating a disquieting scene.
document_data.Activities: Since Imix was a [[primordial]] prince of sinister creatures of fire, many [[efreeti]] and their legions revered him.
